context_bundle.summary: 5-Stage Maturity Model: 1-Ad Hoc (individual automations), 2-Opportunistic (dept-level, some standards), 3-Repeatable (formal program, cross-functional), 4-Managed (strategy-aligned, AI integration), 5-Optimized (embedded in DNA, self-optimizing). Build CoE at Stage 2, Citizen Developer program Stage 2-3.

onboarding.quick_start: Stage 1: Find champions, document wins. Stage 2: Create CoE, develop standards. Stage 3: Scale patterns, measure systematically. Stage 4: Align to strategy, add AI. Stage 5: Innovation culture.
common_patterns: CoE roles: Standards, guidance, components, training, health monitoring
Citizen dev: Build for their area, follow standards, share knowledge
Governance: Exec sponsor, CoE, Process owners, Citizen devs, IT support
Monthly cycle: Collect data -> Analyze -> Plan -> Implement
known_errors: No citizen developer training = shadow IT risks
CoE as bottleneck not enabler = kills adoption
